settings.description: A list of settings related to the build

dumpAssembly.description: true to use include an asm dump of each file in the build, false otherwise.

maxJobs.description: The number of threads to run during compilation. If this number exceeds the capabilities of the processor, the processor's max will be used.

showCommands.description: true to show the commands run during the build, false to just show the source file.

toolchain.description: The toolchain id to use for building, if not the previous one.

signingIdentity.description: The signing identity to use when bundling the macos application bundle.

toolchains.description: A list of compiler toolchains, mapped to the ids: msvc, llvm, or gcc

^[\\w\\-\\+\\.]{3,}$.description: The list of compilers for the platform
